bug.author: dustsigns
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 3.4.0 Operating System / Platform => - Compiler => -
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
The documentation page (<denchmark-link:https://docs.opencv.org/3.4/index.html>https://docs.opencv.org/3.4/index.html</denchmark-link> ) has no option to show the documentation for OpenCV 3.4.0. Other versions like 3.4.1, 3.4.2 etc. are there, but 3.4.0 is missing. <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://docs.opencv.org/3.4>https://docs.opencv.org/3.4</denchmark-link> (linked from <denchmark-link:https://docs.opencv.org/>https://docs.opencv.org/</denchmark-link> ) shows "3.4.2-dev" in the version selection combobox, but there is no option for version 3.4.0.

comments.comment: Thank you for the report! Documentation is in <denchmark-link:https://docs.opencv.org/3.4.0/>place</denchmark-link> , it is just bug in versions switcher. It should work now (press Ctrl+F5 to force reload files from the server).
